cardInfo.heading: Define your solution and what is going to give you a competitive advantage.
cardInfo.placeholder: I am creating Uber with Horses. This is because horses do not release as much carbon as cars. It would also be a unique experience for those looking to commute somewhere.

cardInfo.heading: Define your ultimate goal.
cardInfo.placeholder: Horser is now a horse rental and dealership company. People prefer to use horses due to their environmental benefits. We have lobbied governments to rework infrastructure to support horses and carriages.
